name: Vuetify Grid System Shortcodes
description: Adds shortcode capabilities for the Vuetify grid system.
author: StatCan Digital Innovation

vcol.Hint: Adds a v-col in Vuetify's grid system. cols is the only prop available.

vrow.Hint: Adds a v-row in Vuetify's grid system. align-content is the only prop available.

vcontainer.Hint: Adds a v-container in Vuetify's Grid system. fluid is the only prop available

vspacer.Hint: Adds a v-spacer in Vuetify's grid system. No props are available.
